channel.title: technology on BabaGyan.com
channel.description: Recent content in technology on BabaGyan.com

item.title: A Look at 2019 Analytics news impacting 2020
item.description: Analytics is getting on interesting roads in year 2020 with some big news which came in 2019. Here we take a look at few select such news and talk about it. There are 3 important sections when it comes to analytics: Computing Data science Visualization What we can do with each of these defines the future of this industry. Computing is where we do our analytics and is dominated by big Cloud companies lead by AWS and followed (closely in some areas) by Azure, Google and others.

item.title: Amazing India Technology trip
item.description: COMING SOON A new podcast on Technology, Analytics and Data Science as core with some off-road trips to finance new, world news and related topics. If you want to be our guest on podcast or want to be a co-host or host on your own on the BabaGyan podcast, please write to use an email at Contact@BabaGyan.com!
